question: Aerobiosys Innovations, which has developed an affordable and emergency-use ventilator called 'Jeevan Lite', is an incubated start-up of which institution?
option4: All India Institute of Medical Science
explanation:
Aerobiosys Innovations, an incubated start-up of Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad, Center for Healthcare Entrepreneurship (CfHE) has developed an affordable and emergency-use ventilator called \'Jeevan Lite\'.
This portable device is Internet of Things (IoT)-enabled and can be operated through a mobile application. The ventilator can also be operated by a battery, which enables it to be deployed in areas without power supply.
